## Text Content

- Barbados offers year-round tourism with peak visits from **Dec–Mar** due to trade winds and consistent swell.
- Beginner-friendly beaches and **reef breaks** cater to surfers at all levels, with certified instructors available.
- Lodging spans **family resorts** to **eco-lodges**, with average rates between **BBD 90–180/night**.
- Annual festivals and cultural tours highlight local cuisine, music, and heritage sites.
- Safety guidance covers tides, currents, and reef etiquette; links provided for **live surf/meteorology**.
